attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Abolish the current legal framework which only allow complaints to be about bad manners and do not allow redress against judiciary/barristers etc actioned by the Lord Chief Justice. Prevent Gov bodies perverting the cause of justice when an MP is involved in cases of negligence or unlawful practice.
Make MLA's accountable too for what they do and what they fail in their duty to do.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
